page.title: 20Playground Games
page.content: Here are some of the games played by children at school. Tick, Rallyo, Hide & Seek, Hot Chocolate, Tunnel Tick, Stuck in the Mud, Rain Snow Thunder Lightning, Duck, Honey, Kingy, Bomb, Queenio Shinio Polish, Hopscotch. Queenio Shinio Polish: one person is on and throws a ball behind their shoulder where the others are standing. If someone catches the ball they shout 'chips'. If it bounces someone gets hold of it behind their back then the person who is on will turn and ask everyone to turn around trying not to let anyone see if they have the ball or not. If the person who is on sees the ball they say "Can I have the ball please", if they see they have not got the ball they say "empty dust bin". If they are right they are on again if they are wrong the one with the ball is on.
